channel.title: Horse on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Horse on Martin's Blog

item.title: How I got bullied by three horses
item.description: This is not a photo from the incident Recently I haven not been writing about my treks round Pembrokeshire and how I have been working my way through the “Walking in Pembrokeshire ” guide. I’ve done so many now I have been repeating some of them two to three times. This last walk I did for the first time and is worth mentioning as it was one of the more unusual.
